#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Stay on Top of Yourself
#Text=Some of us need help and guidance to get back on track with life , and this is how you can start .
#Text=We all lose our way sometimes , this article is something useful that will help all of us get back and stay on track .
#Text=Staying on top of your ball game allows you to feel at ease and is good for your physical , mental , and emotional health .
#Text=This article will see everyone happy and [ progressing rather than taking ten steps backwards .
#Text=Everyone deserves to be stable .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Do n't procrastinate or put things on hold .
#Text=Once you start delaying things is when your life starts getting backed up .
#Text=You 'll then have way too much to do all at once and it may not all be finished on time either .
#Text=Then you 'll just start to stress yourself out because then you 'll start to feel like you 're slowing down while life is only moving forward , leaving you for dust .
#Text=Everything will just start to overwhelm you to a point to where you almost ca n't even take it anymore .
#Text=Begin early by breaking tasks into small pieces .
#Text=If you need to read a 400-page book for class , it can feel overwhelming , and you may want to stop .
#Text=Force yourself to start .
#Text=Promise yourself that you 'll read one chapter every day .
#Text=When the task becomes less monumental , it is easier to begin .
#Text=Give yourself a schedule .
#Text=Procrastination is easier when you have a large chunk of time and are n't sure how to spend it .
#Text=Break your time into pieces , so you are never overwhelmed by the amount of work you have to do .
#Text=If you successfully follow the schedule , give yourself a reward — a favorite activity , calling a loved one , a special meal , or whatever motivates you .
#Text=Do not overwhelm yourself .
#Text=It 's nice to be well rounded and to do some extra curricular activities or socialize after work but only do what you know you can handle .
#Text=Do not pack work on top of work onto yourself , just because it " looks nice " .
#Text=Sure , with success comes hard work but it is never okay when you 're hurting yourself .
#Text=Find a balance .
#Text=Give yourself time to work on hobbies , be with friends , or do therapeutic activities .
#Text=Remember that performance should never come at the expense of physical or emotional health .
#Text=Perfection is not a realistic goal .
#Text=Make goals for yourself .
#Text=It is always good to keep making goals for yourselves because it gives yourself something new to work towards and keeps yourself going in life .
#Text=With new goals comes new decisions and actions being taken which will be a stepping stone to the next step in life .
#Text=Just make sure you think wisely before you decide on doing anything and know that it is what 's best for yourself .
#Text=Sometimes our goals change , and that 's okay .
#Text=We all change .
#Text=Everyday matter of fact .
#Text=You just have to adjust and adapt .
#Text=Get outdoors every day .
#Text=Sunlight and exercise are known to boost mood .
#Text=Sometimes , when you feel overwhelmed , your body needs a quick break .
#Text=Taking a five- or ten-minute walk will refresh you , improving your mood and ability to focus .
#Text=Know what you stand for .
#Text=You should always keep your morals and beliefs close to you .
#Text=Even if some people disagree or think you 're weird for them , stand by them !
#Text=They 're what YOU believe in , do n't let anyone make you feel bad for any of it .
#Text=That 's one way to go wrong .
#Text=Let your morals and beliefs be known .
#Text=If you feel like something around you is morally wrong , say something .
#Text=Do n't be ashamed .
#Text=Your morals and beliefs are a part of you , it 's like being ashamed of yourself .
#Text=That 's never good .
#Text=Accept your identity — do n't fight it .
#Text=There are some things we cannot change about ourselves : race , past , sexual orientation , disability , et cetera .
#Text=Do n't feel the need to assimilate or hide who you are .
#Text=Your identity is fundamentally okay .
#Text=Believe in yourself .
#Text=The last , yet most important part , believing in yourself .
#Text=As long as you believe in yourself that will be your drive to keep going regardless of the standards .
#Text=You 'll know you have the power to keep going without the need of encouragement from others .
#Text=Believing in yourself is one of the most powerful things you could do for yourself .
#Text=It brings on determination , optimism , and other characteristics that will only help lead you to success .
#Text=So be your own cheerleader in life when you need it .
#Text=Learn how to work hard ; without the need of an applause .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Stay strong and stay motivated .
#Text=You can do whatever you put your mind to , do n't you ever stop believing in yourself .
